# node-id

A random unique id generator

## Quick Start

### Install dependency

```bash
npm i node-id
```

### Import dependency

```bash
const nodeid = require('node-id');
```

### Initialize variable

```bash
let uniqueId = nodeid();
```

### Use id

```bash
console.log(uniqueId);
# b733982913edaacc625d864b
```

or

### Manually input length of id(8-50)

```bash
let uniqueId = nodeid(20);
# 387d952ec2f47b64d48b
```
